meanings.definition: A person who has completed a university degree and is pursuing further education or research.
meanings.sent1: Postgraduates often conduct research in their chosen field.
meanings.sent2: The postgraduates attended a seminar on advanced statistics.
meanings.sent3: The postgraduates decided to investigate the mystery of the missing library books.
meanings.sent4: In the world of academia, postgraduates are like detectives uncovering new knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The postgraduates' passion for learning is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The group of students who have completed a university degree and are pursuing further education or research.
meanings.sent1: The postgraduates gathered in the library for a study session.
meanings.sent2: Our university has a diverse community of postgraduates.
meanings.sent3: The postgraduates organized a fun quiz night for charity.
meanings.sent4: Among the postgraduates, there was a sense of shared purpose and camaraderie.
meanings.sent5: The postgraduates' dedication to their studies is commendable.
